description: Cumulative counting sequence: method B (noun,adjective)-pairs with first term 2.
comments: Segments (generated as at A055168):  2; 2,1; 2,2,1,1; 2,4,1,3,2,5; ...Conjecture: every positive integer occurs.
example: Write 2, thus having 2 once, thus having 2 twice and 1 once, thus having 2 4 times and 1 3 times and 2 5 times, etc.
mathematica: s = {2}; Do[s = Flatten[{s, {#,Count[s, #]} & /@ DeleteDuplicates[s]}], {24}]; s (* Peter Moses, Mar 21 2013 *)
author: _Clark Kimberling_, Apr 27 2000
